definition: to go off accidentally/to catch fire
to walk/to go/to run/to move (of vehicle)/to visit/to leave/to go away/to die (euph.)/from/through/away (in compound verbs, such as 撤走[che4 zou3])/to change (shape, form, meaning)
fire/urgent/ammunition/fiery or flaming/internal heat (Chinese medicine)/hot (popular)/classifier for military units (old)/Kangxi radical 86
to shoot accidentally while polishing a gun/(fig.) a minor incident that sparks a war
to be obsessed with sth/to go overboard/(Buddhism, Taoism) to misguidedly focus on hallucinations that arise during meditation

sentences.english: He accidentally trod on her foot.
sentences.chinese: 他意外走火打中了自己的脚。

sentences.english: Still, this can be a maddening book.
sentences.chinese: 尽管如此，这可能是一本走火入魔的书。

sentences.english: The goal of this research is to establish an arc residue analysis databank, including both arcing initiating fires and fires causing arcing .
sentences.chinese: 本研究的目的在建立电线走火熔痕之表面分析资料库。

sentences.english: The gun went off, putting a bullet into Ferreira’s spine.
sentences.chinese: 枪走火，子弹击中了他的脊椎。

sentences.english: Kendall: And so to avoid any tragic misfires , I would ask that you all turn off your cell phones.
sentences.chinese: 所以为了避免走火的悲剧，我想请你们把手机都关掉。

sentences.english: I got a little carried away with the decorations.
sentences.chinese: 我对于装潢有点走火入魔了。

sentences.english: Otherwise meaningless stunt too many special, things will be very deviated from the normal track.
sentences.chinese: 否则无意义的特技专场太多，就会显得走火入魔。

sentences.english: The weapon discharged when it hit the ground.

definition: to be obsessed with sth/to go overboard/(Buddhism, Taoism) to misguidedly focus on hallucinations that arise during meditation
to open fire/to shoot a gun
to shoot accidentally while polishing a gun/(fig.) a minor incident that sparks a war
roof of the mouth/to load (a gun)
gun/firearm/rifle/spear/thing with shape or function similar to a gun/CL:支[zhi1],把[ba3],桿|杆[gan3],條|条[tiao2],枝[zhi1]/to substitute for another person in a test/to knock/classifier for rifle shots
to shoot with a gun/shooting incident
